meanings.definition: Refer to something briefly or in passing.
meanings.sent1: She mentioned her favorite book during the discussion.
meanings.sent2: He mentioned the upcoming event in passing.
meanings.sent3: The teacher mentioned the pop quiz, causing a collective groan from the students.
meanings.sent4: The news anchor mentioned the breaking news with a sense of urgency.
meanings.sent5: The detective mentioned a crucial clue that could solve the case.

meanings.definition: Bring up or introduce something in conversation or writing.
meanings.sent1: They mentioned their vacation plans to their friends.
meanings.sent2: I mentioned your idea in the meeting today.
meanings.sent3: The comedian mentioned a funny anecdote that had the audience roaring with laughter.
meanings.sent4: The author mentioned a new character that would change the course of the story.
meanings.sent5: She mentioned a brilliant solution to the problem that no one had thought of before.
